p: Providing support to the findings of this research, Ajitha et al. (2014) [ 35] found potential inhibition of the species P. amboinicus against Staphylococcus spp., Escherichia coli, Pseudomonas spp. and Bacillus spp. The authors describe halos measuring around 10Â mm, i.e., values lower than those found in the present study.
